title: Physics for Class 9-10
about: Physics is an important subject for the students of science. Most of the time it is not so easy to catch the topics of this subject. We are offering you a organised course on Physics. If you want to learn the core concepts of Physics you may enroll to this course. You will get special notes and guidline frome our course. After completing a chepter we generaly take quiz on that chapter. Chapterwise model test and final model test will be taken and after successfully completing this course you will get a valuable certificate also.

title: BCS Preparation
about: Are a job seeker? Do you want to be a government job holder specially BCS Cadre. We are offering this course to prepare students for BCS preliminary, written and viva examination. 45 th BSC circular is knocking the door. So if you are determined to be a BCS cadre you can join to this course. This course is designed with 10 core subjects of BCS preliminary examination. 120+ Model Test and 500+ Lecture sheet you can access after enrolling to this course.
